text: He was afflicted by the thought that where Beauty was, nothing ever ran quite straight, which no doubt, was why so many people looked on it as immoral.
author: John Galsworthy

text: Americans worship creativity the way they worship physical beauty - as a way of enjoying elitism without guilt: God did it.
author: Florence King

text: I was amazed and upset by the looks I got just walking around the studio... It illuminates the ugliness and the beauty that exists within each of us, and that's what this story represents to me.
author: Gerard Butler

text: Beauty is only skin deep, and the world is full of thin skinned people.
author: Richard Armour

text: That brings me to Dennis Ritchie. Our collaboration has been a thing of beauty.
author: Ken Thompson
